Job Title: Purchasing Coordinator

Location: Ohio, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Purchasing, Supply Chain

Description:
ClassificationNon-Exempt Salary Grade/Level/Family/RangeDependent on experience & skills level
BenefitsWeekly payFull time Day shift 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. M-FPaid vacation timeHealth insuranceDental insuranceVision insuranceLife insuranceSimple IRA with 3% company match Company issued Mac laptop
FOREWORDAre you looking to be part of a growing, dynamic, professional company? Then youâ€™ve come to the right place. We are a premier sign company with a National footprint that offers branding and imaging solutions for many industries such as Petroleum/C-Stores, Lodging, Banking, Retail and many others. Our client base is with National clients such as Hyatt, HomeTowne Studios, Red Roof Inn, Valero, ExxonMobil, BP, Speedway, Bank of Montreal, TD Bank, Advance Auto Parts, Tire Discounters, & Sherwin-Williams just to name a few.For more information about our company, check out our website at www.triumphsigns.com.
Key ResponsibilitiesSummary/Objective Upon customer approval and permit acquisition by the Project Coordinator, the Purchasing Coordinator will be responsible for tracking of products required for the project. We are looking for someone that is analytical and able to create multiple reports for tracking ship dates, inventory and cost. Must have experience with Purchase Orders and is an excellent communicator. We are looking for a self-starter who knows how to do the Purchasing Role from experience.
Essential Functions Purchasing Coordinator duties:Tracking of products required for a project.Assisting the sales and project coordinators with product recommendations.Supporting the coordination of supplies.Researching information as required.Keeping track of and generating inventory reportsCompleting any tasks assigned by the COO in an efficient and timely manner.Performs Data Entry related to miscellaneous projects.Keeping the database updated with current COIs and vendor information.Collaborates with co-workers, vendors, and customers related to project needs as assigned by the Project Coordinator.Assists with other miscellaneous related duties as assigned and needed.Generating miscellaneous inventory reports or other reports requested by the COO.
Competencies/Skill Set requirements:3-5 years previous experience in an Purchasing role preferredHighly organized and able to multitaskStrong attention to detail and problem solving skillsExcellent communication skills both written and verbalAble to work independently and as apart of a teamAnalytical and able to create various reports
Supervisory ResponsibilityThis position has no supervisory responsibility.
Work EnvironmentThis job generally operates in a professional office environment. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, copiers. 
Physical DemandsThe physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to stand; walk; use hands to finger, handle or feel; and reach with hands and arms.The employee is occasionally required to sit; climb or balance; and stoop, kneel, crouch or crawl. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus.
Position Type/Expected Hours of WorkThis position is Full-time and regularly requires 40 hours a week (In-Office)Workday is typically 8:00am to 5:00pm M-FEmployees are expected to use their personal cell phones to take calls and emails after hours as needed.
TravelThere may be occasional travel with this position.
Other DutiesPlease note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without notice.

Experience Level (if available): None
